entry.title: gbxyz/p5-xml-ietf
entry.summary:
An interface to the IETF XML Registry.

XML::IETF provides a simple interface to the IETF XML Registry, specified in RFC 3688.

This permits for example, dynamically retrieve and load XML schema files using only their target namespace or mnemonic name. This is quite useful for schema- heavy protocols such as EPP.
